[i]({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)[/i]
This land enters tapped.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this Memory: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
notes:
!tokens Treasure EIW
art4

People won't fight to save the world but they'll fight for a user they care about.
